nodes.text: Tanks were armored cavalry ground assault vehicles that were capable of extreme mobility thanks to their tracks, legs, wheels or a repulsorlift. Used by armies as part of armored cavalry units, they were designed for front-line combat as well as intimidation. They typically boasted large laser cannons mounted on turrets or other powerful anti-vehicle weaponry, and were heavily armored to protect the troops operating the weapons and the propulsion systems inside.

The Trade Federation, InterGalactic Banking Clan, Corporate Alliance, Umbaran Militia, Galactic Republic, Confederacy of Independent Systems, Galactic Empire, and Alliance to Restore the Republic all manufactured or deployed tanks in some capacity.
